titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on Avermectin B, 1,4"-deoxy-4"-methylamino-, (4"r)-, benzoate.
A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on Avermectin B, 1,4"-deoxy-4"-methylamino-, (4"r)-, benzoate.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on Avermectin B, 1,4"-deoxy-4"-methylamino-, (4"r)-, benzoate.
